neighbors.title: Real Taste Guarantee
neighbors.description: Slice-of-life comedy showing various people's reactions when they accidentally use a non-Heinz ketchup. Warm, relatable humor.
neighbors.script_excerpt: INT. KITCHEN - DAY. A family sits down to dinner. Dad reaches for the ketchup...

neighbors.title: The List
neighbors.description: A couple arguing over a shopping list that becomes increasingly absurd. Physical comedy and witty dialogue.
neighbors.script_excerpt: INT. CAR - DAY. HE: 'Did you remember the MALM?' SHE: 'The what?' HE: (dramatic pause) 'The MALM.'

neighbors.title: The Journey Home
neighbors.description: Emotional Christmas ad following a child's journey to find the perfect gift for their parent. Features stop-motion animation and a cover of a classic song.
neighbors.script_excerpt: OPEN on a snow-covered village... A child peers through a frosted window...

neighbors.title: Impossible is Nothing
neighbors.description: High-energy sports montage featuring diverse athletes overcoming personal challenges. Features quick cuts and inspiring voiceover.
neighbors.script_excerpt: VO: They said you couldn't... QUICK CUTS of athletes training in dawn light...

neighbors.title: Connected
neighbors.description: Touching story of a grandmother learning to video call her grandchildren abroad. Demonstrates technology bridging distances.
neighbors.script_excerpt: CLOSE UP on weathered hands holding a smartphone. We hear a child's voice: 'Hi Nana!'

neighbors.title: Dream Bigger
neighbors.description: Aspirational ad following a young entrepreneur building their business with bank support. Warm, optimistic tone.
neighbors.script_excerpt: TIMELAPSE: An empty shop transforms into a thriving bakery. VO: 'Every big dream starts somewhere small...'

neighbors.title: Midnight Feast
neighbors.description: Nostalgic recreation of childhood midnight snacking. Warm, cozy aesthetic with subtle humor.
neighbors.script_excerpt: INT. DARK BEDROOM - NIGHT. A child's feet pad silently down the hallway...

neighbors.title: The Audition
neighbors.description: Disability-inclusive comedy featuring a woman in a wheelchair auditioning for a play. Sharp, witty humor that challenges stereotypes.
neighbors.script_excerpt: INT. THEATRE - DAY. A casting director looks uncomfortable. 'So, about the wheelchair...'

## 30-second TV Commercial

### Scene 1: Opening [00:00 - 00:05]
Opening with emotional storytelling to capture attention immediately

### Scene 2: Development [00:05 - 00:20]
A character-driven narrative that tugs at heartstrings. The ad focuses on The refreshing choice through a Warm and aspirational lens.

### Scene 3: Climax [00:20 - 00:25]
Key moments:
- Opening emotional storytelling moment
- Brand/product reveal
- Emotional peak
- Memorable closing

### Scene 4: Resolution [00:25 - 00:30]
Experience TestBrand today
